attributes.action: Thugs aged 17 - 24 must be signed up for active service
attributes.additional_details:
When people cause issues, like riots, stealing, damaging property and even hurting others. Rather than arresting them and wasting more of the TAX payers money, will instead be automatically signed up to serve the country on a reduced wage. The money saved from the legal system, would save everyone so much money, also providing us with a army that will protect the country.
They will then learn what respect means, they will learn about the men and women that saved them in the last world wars, they will also find out what its like to fight for their lives on the front line.
This should be compulsory to all that are arrested. This would solve all the issues that we now have in the country, it would also give these people a cause, which they do not have at the moment.

compulsory Active service for anyone aged 17 - 24 who cause trouble within their community...

This is what should be done. Sign today so we can make a difference for their futures...
